snippet.title: Astro Hunters VR - Cinematic Trailer
snippet.description:
Embark on an epic interstellar journey in Astro Hunters VR, the open-world VR action game set in space. Immerse yourself in the exploration of diverse planets, fight with different enemies, craft, gather resources and upgrade your weapons – either solo or in multiplayer.

🚀 Add the game to your wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2715910/Astro_Hunters_VR/
🚀 Official website: https://www.wenklystudio.com/astro-hunters-vr
